content: squiggles instructions by donna kay lacey round 1 form an magic_ring chain 3 as double_crochet 7 double_crochet in ring slip_stitch to 3rd chain of beg chain-3 pull tail to tighten ring 8 double_crochet round 2 chain 4 as treble_crochet 2 double_crochet in same st *fptr around next st ** corner as 2 double_crochet treble_crochet 2 double_crochet in next st * repeat from * to * 3 times ending at ** on final repeat 2 double_crochet in same st as beg chain-4 slip_stitch to 4th chain of beg chain-4 4 fptr 4 treble_crochet 16 double_crochet round 3 chain 4 as treble_crochet 2 next st skip next st 5 times double_crochet in next 2 crochet hook sts **corner as 2 double_crochet treble_crochet 2 double_crochet in next st * repeat from * to * us size 8/h 5 0 3 times ending at ** on final repeat 2 double_crochet in same st as beg notions chain-4 slip_stitch to 4th chain of beg chain-4 20 fptr 4 treble_crochet 52 double_crochet yarn needle finished measurements round 6 chain 1 3 single_crochet in same st *single_crochet in next 18 sts **corner 6 x 6 as 3 single_crochet in next st * repeat from * to * 3 times ending at ** abbreviations and special stitches on final repeat invisible join to beg single_crochet to fasten_off 84 single_crochet front post treble_crochet fptr yo twice insert hook from front to back around post of stitch finishing indicated pull up a loop yo
